SQL.statement: REATE TABLE ORDERTAB ( "PRTN_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "DIV_ID" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "PROD_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "CUST_NO" DECIMAL(11,0) NOT NULL , "ORD_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BAS_PROJ_TYP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "BAS_PROJ_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "DYN_PROJ_TYP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "DYN_PROJ_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "AP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "CLM_RET_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "RET_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "CLM_PD_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "REM_COMMIT_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "COMMIT_DUE_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "BAT_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BOOK_CAN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "BOOK_CAN_CSE_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "CHG_WHL_ACCEPT_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "CHRG_ACCT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "CONF_LTR_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "CONTRA_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "DSCNT_PCT" DECIMAL(3,0) NOT NULL , "DUN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "DUN_FE_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "DUN_LVL" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "DUN_LVL_REL_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "DUN_RSN_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ORD_CYC" INTEGER NOT NULL , "ORD_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "DSTRB_INDEX_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "GU_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "GU_UN_PR_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "ART_PR_GU_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "INST_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LST_DELIV_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LST_PAY_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "MAIL_ID_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "MEDIA_CDE" CHAR(3) NOT NULL , "BILL_OCC_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "DSCNT_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "DSCNT_CAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "ORD_PRI_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ORD_SUB_TYP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "PPD_PCT" DECIMAL(3,0) NOT NULL , "RES_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_2_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_2_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_2_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_2_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_3_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_3_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_3_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_3_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_4_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_4_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_4_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_4_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_5_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_5_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_5_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_5_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "SALES_TYP_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "SLL_ID" CHAR(8) NOT NULL , "SETTLE_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "SHP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "SHP_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "PD_SHP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "PD_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "FREE_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "TOT_BAL_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "TOT_PD_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "ORD_TYP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "BILL_METH_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "PPD_SHP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "PPD_SHP_GU_PR_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "SUBSCR_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "NPPD_SHP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "NPPD_SHP_GU_PR_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "NEXT_SUBSCR_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "REFERR_ORD_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "SHP_ITV_DAY_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "SHP_UN_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "SIGN_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "SRC_1_CDE" INTEGER NOT NULL , "SRC_2_CDE" INTEGER NOT NULL , "TERM_DELIV_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "TERM_PAY_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "WHL_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BOB_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "MARK_UP_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "MARK_UP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "INST_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "INST_PRD_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "FREE_ALPHA_TXT" CHAR(10) NOT NULL , "CUR_SPOKE_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "WH_CDE" CHAR(3) NOT NULL , "RTN_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "MW_INDEX_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BAD_CHQ_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "LOAD_UP_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "INST_PH_FST_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "ST_ERL_SHP_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "CSEC_NO_SHP_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "CSEC_UNPD_SHP_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "CSEC_RET_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "WHL_LGT_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ME_REV_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "ME_COST_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "ME_STRTR_COST_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "LST_SHP_TYP_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "PRINT_TRN_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "FORM_ID" CHAR(6) NOT NULL , "SHP_SORT_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LST_INVC_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "CAN_RSN_CDE" CHAR(4) NOT NULL , "DELIV_STAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "FST_DUN_CYC" INTEGER NOT NULL , "RET_TOT_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "MGM_GFT_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "MGM_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "PD_OFR_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "BOOK_CAN_REM_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BOOK_CAN_RSN_CDE" CHAR(4) NOT NULL , "FREE_NUM_NO" DECIMAL(11,0) NOT NULL , "FIX_SHP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "OFR_TYP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "OFR_TYP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ACTIV_1_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ACTIV_1_CYC" INTEGER NOT NULL , "ACTIV_2_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ACTIV_2_CYC" INTEGER NOT NULL , "ACTIV_3_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ACTIV_3_CYC" INTEGER NOT NULL , "OLD_WHL_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "OLD_SHP_UN_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "DUN_ST_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "REFERR_ORD_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "TXT_REF_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "TXT_CDE" CHAR(5) NOT NULL , "RETEN_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "FST_RETEN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LST_SHP_RUN_TME_NO" INTEGER NOT NULL , "CLM_RET_TOT_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "NO_SHP_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "FREE_SHP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "STST_PROJ_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "ADDR_SEQ" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "UPD_TMS" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "UPD_USER_ID" CHAR(8) NOT NULL , "REINST_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LST_PAY_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "ENTRA_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TOT_BAL_TX_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TOT_PD_TX_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "ORD_GRP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "RSPBL_CDE" CHAR(4) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "ORD_CLS_CDE" CHAR(3) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "STST_DUN_LVL" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "EXCL_SHP_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "ORIGIN" CHAR(4) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "WOD_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BPI_REV_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "QTY_DSCNT_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "INVC_TXT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PRSNT_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "OLD_PRSNT_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_FST_CYC" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_LVL" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_MAX_DUE_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TM_ID" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BON_CHQ_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "OLD_PD_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "OLD_MGM_GFT_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BON_OLD_SHP_UN_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "SHP_UN_CHG_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PRD_USED_PNTS_QTY" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TOT_USED_PNTS_QTY" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LST_DEL_GRP_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LST_DEL_SEQ_NO" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "ORIGIN_ORD_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "YOUR_REF_ID" CHAR(20) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "CONTRA_STAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'N' , "CHILD_SEQ" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "REFERR_ORD_DUN_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "RSPND_CAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'R' , "WO_BAL_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'N' , "NO_SHP_CSE_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LST_LC_STAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LS_LC_STAT_CSE_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PPO_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BAD_CHQ_FE_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BAD_CHQ_DUN_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'Y' , "BAD_CHQ_COLL_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'Y' , "SUBSCR_RENEW_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT '0001-01-01' , "SUBSCR_RENEW_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "NEWS_LTR_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'Y' , "MAX_CONSG_SPLIT_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "UNAPPL_ART_RET_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "UNAPPL_BAL_LTR_FLG" CHAR(1) WITH DEFAULT ' ' , "SHP_UNAPPL_FLG" CHAR(1) WITH DEFAULT ' ' , "ART_DSCNT_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT ) CCSID ASCII DATA CAPTURE CHANGES PARTITION BY RANGE("PRTN_NO") (PART "PART0" STARTING(1) IN "TS1", PART "PART1" STARTING(2) IN "TS2", PART "PART2" STARTING(3) IN "TS3", PART "PART3" STARTING(4) IN "TS4", PART "PART4" STARTING(5) IN "TS5", PART "PART5" STARTING(6) IN "TS6", PART "PART6" STARTING(7) IN "TS7", PART "PART7" STARTING(8) IN "TS8", PART "PART8" STARTING(9) IN "TS9", PART "PART9" STARTING(10) IN "TS10", PART "PART10" STARTING(11) IN "TS11", PART "PART11" STARTING(12) IN "TS12", PART "PART12" STARTING(13) IN "TS13", PART "PART13" STARTING(14) IN "TS14", PART "PART14" STARTING(15) IN "TS15", PART "PART15" STARTING(16) ENDING(16) IN "TS16")

ALTER TABLE "ORDERTAB" ADD PRIMARY KEY ("PRTN_NO", "DIV_ID", "PROD_SFX", "CUST_NO", "ORD_SFX"); CREATE INDEX "XIE1ORDERTAB" ON "ORDERTAB" ("CUST_NO" ASC, "ORD_SFX" ASC) NOT PARTITIONED IN "TS17" ALLOW REVERSE SCANS; CREATE TABLE GENERIC (RECID CHAR(3) NOT NULL, FILENO CHAR(3) NOT NULL, FLOAT4NN FLOAT(4) NOT NULL, FLOAT4NNWD FLOAT(4) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT, FLOAT4WDN FLOAT(4) WITH DEFAULT NULL, FLOAT4WD FLOAT(4) WITH DEFAULT 15E1, FLOAT8 FLOAT, INTCOLNN INTEGER NOT NULL, INTCOLNND INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT, INTCOLNNWD INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT, INTCOLWDN INTEGER WITH DEFAULT NULL, SMINT SMALLINT , CHARCHCK CHAR(8) CHECK (CHARCHCK <> 'CHRCHCK'), DEC150 DECIMAL(15, 0), NUMERIC83NN NUMERIC(8,3) NOT NULL, NUMERIC83NND NUMERIC(8,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT, NUMERIC83NNWD NUMERIC(8,3) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT, NUMERIC83WDN NUMERIC(8,3) WITH DEFAULT NULL, CHAR8NN CHAR(8) NOT NULL, CHAR8NND CHAR(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT, CHAR8NNWD CHAR(8) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT, CHAR8WDN CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT NULL, CHAR15D CHAR(15), CHAR8WD CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT 'Az019%', CHAR8DU CHAR(8) DEFAULT 'USER', CHAR8WDU CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT 'USER', CHAR8WDCS CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT 'USER', CHAR8DCS CHAR(8) DEFAULT 'USER', CHAR1 CHAR(1), CHAR1CC1 CHAR(1) CONSTRAINT CC1 CHECK (CHAR1CC1 < 'J'), CHAR7 CHAR(7) WITH DEFAULT '123', CHAR7SBCS CHAR(7), CHAR7BIT CHAR(7) FOR BIT DATA, VCHAR20 VARCHAR(20), VCHAR20SBCS VARCHAR(20), VCHAR20BIT VARCHAR(20) FOR BIT DATA, VCHAR20NN VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, VCHAR20NND VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, VCHAR20NNWD VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT, VCHAR20WDN VARCHAR(20) WITH DEFAULT NULL, LVCHAR VARCHAR(300), LVCHARSBCS VARCHAR(300), LVCHARBIT VARCHAR(300) FOR BIT DATA, DATE1 DATE, DATE1DN DATE WITH DEFAULT NULL, TIME1 TIME, TIME1DN TIME WITH DEFAULT NULL, TIMESTMP TIMESTAMP, TIMESTMPNN TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, REAL1 REAL, DOUBLE1 DOUBLE PRECISION, SORT_FIELD CHAR(40), CHARWD1 CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT 'AzbY019%', CHARWD2 CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT '123', VCHAR20WD VARCHAR(20) WITH DEFAULT 'VCHAR20DEFAULT', LVCHAR20WD VARCHAR(300) WITH DEFAULT 'LONGVCHAR20DEFAULT', DEFUSER CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT 'ADMF001', DEFSQLID CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT 'ADMF001', DEFNULL CHAR(8) WITH DEFAULT NULL, DATE2 DATE NOT NULL, TIMESTAMP2 TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, IDCOLINT INTEGER GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( START WITH 0, INCREMENT BY 1, NO CACHE), CLOB30 CLOB(30), CLOB30SBCS CLOB(30), BLOB30 BLOB(30)) DATA CAPTURE CHANGES PARTITION BY RANGE("IDCOLINT") (PART "PART0" STARTING(1) IN "GENERAL", PART "PART1" STARTING(20) IN "GENERAL", PART "PART2" STARTING(40) IN "GENERAL", PART "PART3" STARTING(60) IN "FIRST", PART "PART4" STARTING(80) IN "FIRST", PART "PART5" STARTING(100) IN "FIRST", PART "PART6" STARTING(120) IN "SECOND", PART "PART7" STARTING(200) IN "SECOND", PART "PART8" STARTING(300) IN "SECOND", PART "PART9" STARTING(400) IN "SECOND", PART "PART10" STARTING(500) IN "THIRD", PART "PART11" STARTING(600) IN "THIRD", PART "PART12" STARTING(700) IN "THIRD", PART "PART13" STARTING(800) IN "THIRD", PART "PART14" STARTING(900) IN "THIRD", PART "PART15" STARTING(1000) ENDING(1250) IN "THIRD") INDEX IN USERSPACE3; CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IUWOGRE ON GENERIC (IDCOLINT) ; SET CURRENT SCHEMA = 'AMEHCS01'; CREATE TABLE CIRENEG ( "PRTN_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "DIV_ID" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "PROD_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "CUST_NO" DECIMAL(11,0) NOT NULL , "ORD_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BAS_PROJ_TYP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "BAS_PROJ_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "DYN_PROJ_TYP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "DYN_PROJ_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "AP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "CLM_RET_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "RET_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "CLM_PD_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "REM_COMMIT_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "COMMIT_DUE_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "BAT_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BOOK_CAN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "BOOK_CAN_CSE_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "CHG_WHL_ACCEPT_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "CHRG_ACCT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "CONF_LTR_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "CONTRA_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "DSCNT_PCT" DECIMAL(3,0) NOT NULL , "DUN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "DUN_FE_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "DUN_LVL" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "DUN_LVL_REL_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "DUN_RSN_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ORD_CYC" INTEGER NOT NULL , "ORD_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "DSTRB_INDEX_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "GU_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "GU_UN_PR_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "ART_PR_GU_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "INST_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LST_DELIV_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LST_PAY_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "MAIL_ID_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "MEDIA_CDE" CHAR(3) NOT NULL , "BILL_OCC_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "DSCNT_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "DSCNT_CAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "ORD_PRI_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "ORD_SUB_TYP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "PPD_PCT" DECIMAL(3,0) NOT NULL , "RES_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_2_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_2_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_2_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_2_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_3_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_3_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_3_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_3_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_4_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_4_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_PLN_4_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_CSE_4_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_5_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "LC_STAT_5_DTE" DATE NOT NULL , "SHP_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "PD_SHP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "PD_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "FREE_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "TOT_BAL_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "TOT_PD_AMT" , "NPPD_SHP_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "NPPD_SHP_GU_PR_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "NEXT_SUBSCR_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "REFERR_ORD_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "SHP_ITV_DAY_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "SHP_UN_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "SIGN_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "SRC_1_CDE" INTEGER NOT NULL , "SRC_2_CDE" INTEGER NOT NULL , "TERM_DELIV_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "TERM_PAY_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL , "WHL_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BOB_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "MARK_UP_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL , "MARK_UP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL , "INST_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "INST_PRD_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL , NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_LVL" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_MAX_DUE_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TM_ID" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT ,
